sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { PaticipantesService } from '../../services/paticipantes.service'; import { PrizesComponent } from '../prizes/prizes.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sorteo', templateUrl: './sorteo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sorteo.component.scss'] }) export class SorteoComponent { participants: { name: string, department: string }[] = []; prizes: string[] = []; winner: string = ''; winningPrize: string = ''; winningDepartment: string = ''; constructor(private _participanteServices: PaticipantesService) { this.participants = this._participanteServices.getData('participante') || []; } pickWinner(): void { if (this.participants.length > 0 && this.prizes.length > 0) { const randomParticipantIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * this.participants.length); const randomPrizeIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * this.prizes.length); const winnerInfo = this.participants[randomParticipantIndex]; this.winner = winnerInfo.name; this.winningDepartment = winnerInfo.department; this.winningPrize = this.prizes[randomPrizeIndex]; // Ocultar el ganador y el premio después de 6 segundos setTimeout(() => { this.resetWinner(); }, 6000); } } resetWinner(): void { this.winner = ''; this.winningPrize = ''; this.winningDepartment = ''; } addParticipant(name: string, department: string): void { if (name.trim() && department.trim()) { this.participants.push({ name, department }); this._participanteServices.saveData('participants', this.participants) } } deleteParticipant(participant: { name: string, department: string }) { const index = this.participants.indexOf(participant); if (index !== -1) { this.participants.splice(index, 1); this._participanteServices.saveData('participants', this.participants); } } }

Participantes del Sorteo

Cantidad: {{ participants.length }}
Nombre Departamento
{{ participant.name }} {{ participant.department }}
No hay participantes aún

¡El ganador es: {{ winner }} del departamento {{ winningDepartment }}!

Premio: {{ winningPrize }}
